ygData.subject: RE: Cape of midnight mist
ygData.msgSnippet: The Butler is (i think) an even /con at 29 or 30.  He s not real high level, but because MM castle resembles grand central station, and attempts to pull from
ygData.messageBody:
The Butler is (i think) an even /con at 29 or 30. He's not real high level,
but because MM castle resembles grand central station, and attempts to pull
from the castle often result in "Very Bad Things" it is alot harder to get than
just killing one mid-level named spawn.

[spoilerey type stuff]





The Cape is his Common drop too..
the rare drop is his Fang (which is needed for the Electrum Bladed Wakazishi
quest)

kaleid
23rd song
<Wave of the Dark tide>
Prexus

=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
